comment.body:
There's more to consider.

When I load or reload Reddit pages the usual way I see the blank icons and media placeholders, and the Adguard blocked ads counter shows 0. However, when I reload the page from the filtering log pane, the page displays the correct layout with all the media loaded and the Adguard blocked ads counter is more than 0.

I post screenshots related to every group of filters applied in the _latter_ case.

The screenshot of a correctly displayed Reddit page.

![reddit-subreddits-general](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45983734/202825833-6eac8edd-c5d7-4d9b-942b-f1d2512d6bb3.png)
